Message:
Sometime after I was dispatched
to a unit as a squire...

a new recruit was put
under my care.

definitely not someone
fit enough to be a knight...

But surely she came here
because she wanted to become
a knight of justice—just like me.

So I had to support and
guide her in every way I could...

It didn’t look like she could make
it through the intense training,

I truly believed it would
all help her grow...

Lately, it feels like people are
watching, even laughing at me...
